website_summaries.verdict: Streamlined helmet offers high-quality features at a mid-range price.
pros: Polymer alloy shell is light but strong with spoiler for better aerodynamics and less noise
Bluetooth system features 1,200-yard range, exceptional 24 hours talk time, plus 600-hour standby
cons: Quality control seems to be an issue, with more fault reports than we like to see

customer_reviews.title: The Bluetooth charging port is hidden! But easy enough to find. Great helmet.
customer_reviews.text: Helmet fits nice for having a big head. Orederd an XL. Sharp clean helmet. Looks really nice. The Bluetooth charging port is a bit tricky to find but it’s nice because it’s not in the way. It’s at the back side of the helmet under the padding. I broke the cover off right away but it’s nothung important. Ordered a little bit darker visor but with the drop down inside visor I might not need it. Overall I’m happy with it. Haven’t used the Bluetooth yet but will update later.
customer_reviews.author: Thebeekeeper77....

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Overall awesome helmet for the price! The bluetooth works phenomenal. I can pair with my boyfriends to talk to him while riding. Pause us talking and go right back to listening to music. It might just be my head but after a while of riding in new hampshire my helmet felt loose. Loose to the point of it moving around and bouncing and making a bump on my head haha. So go down a size if you can, my head may just be in between sizes. It's an easy fix for me, I just put on a bandana. If your not sure to buy it or not, I feel like it's a steal for the price. 😁Happy riding!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Alves

customer_reviews.title: Not very ear friendly...
customer_reviews.text: As one of the reviewers said, it rubs the crap out of your ears. There is a seam or something that rubs on your ear. Quite a bit of wind noise, so if you’re on the highway, you won’t really hear anything over the crappy speakers. The padding isn’t very good either. It’s not dense enough or something. The helmet gets looser and looser as you’re wearing it. Wore it once on a 900 mile trip. Big mistake.
customer_reviews.author: justin lytle

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet! Five stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: The helmet arrive as it described on the listing, very comfortable with suede padding. All function works well, I like the drop-down sun visor, the Bluetooth paring is fairly easy to setup very clear voice and you can hear your fellow biker in a certain distant when paired with other helmet in this TORC brand. Overall I like this helmet a lot!!! thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Solid helmet that won’t break your wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I love this helmet!!! I was pretty skeptical about purchasing it online but it came in fast and the sound quality is amazing. I’m able to listen to music or receive phone calls on my longer road trips. The sizing guide is spot on I myself have a 57 in head and even though it fits snug all helmets will at first until the pads relax more. This type of helmet is great for long road trips where you just wanna ride and enjoy your music! Will definitely buy another helmet in the future for my wife!
customer_reviews.author: RODNEY A FISHER II

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, mic arrangement stinks .
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time ,but broken ,one side of the ear piece wasnt working so I returned it. Back charging port cover pops out easy when you try to open the little rubber tabs. Microphone isnt fixed,its a wire with the mic on the end tucked Into the padding which I didnt care for.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen mixed reviews on this product. I went for it because of the price. This is exactly what I’ve been searching for and it’s worth every cent!! It was confusing at first, not really any instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene W

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this if you don’t have an electric bike. I own a 2008 Hayabusa with Voodoo exhaust. You can’t hear anything over the exhaust. The phone connected to a call easy enough however the person I was talking to couldn’t hear anything till I pulled over and came to a stop. I reached out to customer service over a week ago and haven’t received a response from them.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L. Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my son, he loves it. Everything he expected the only reason it was not 5 stars was we ended up getting it a week later than expected and tracking info was not available but amazon was right on it and did a great job researching it for me
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie S. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Buy it anything close to this is 500.00 or more!
customer_reviews.text: When you talk back-and-forth you have to call the other person and they pick up the phone and you can talk for three minutes there is no constant intercom . Everything else is great finding the charging place it’s in the back left side if you’ve got it facing you turned over ,there’s a little plastic tab you have to take off and you’ll see the little USB when you pull the rubber out on the very back you won’t break it. Four Hours to charge it. No wires is what I love clear Music plenty loud!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: great helmet for the price
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is great, looks awesome with the flip down visor, the bluetooth works amazing and can here pretty well most times. One draw back is the wind noise is pretty bad and lets too much air in the helmet
customer_reviews.author: sfury

customer_reviews.title: Completely disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Helmets left speaker doesn’t work will return and update on new helmet Maxhelmets was unhelpful in resolving the broken speaker with a new speaker or new helmet luckily Amazon provided excellent help in getting a full refund will not buy from again
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Alot of Value
customer_reviews.text: Love The Bluetooth. Dislikes are not loud enough and it Cuts in And Out.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t what I was expecting for $200 feels Like a cheap Chinese and I don’t even know where the charge port is to re-charge the Bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. After three weeks of light use, the Bluetooth stopped working and the interior comes apart easily while riding. Don’t waste your money, probably one of the worst helmets I’ve ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: OLD ACCOUNT DO NOT USE

customer_reviews.title: Love this helmet best one I have comfortable Bluetooth works ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this helmet best one I have comfortable Bluetooth works great price for all you get. Rear view camera would even make it better
customer_reviews.author: Brian E Loveless

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet for the price. Fit was great, bluetooth works well at highway speeds. I really like the flip down sunvisor. Would recommend to anyone looking for a full face helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Justin L. Francis

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet. Not great Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and comfortable. The Bluetooth aspect doesn’t work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Mike is the man
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the helmet, was to big and mike, made it happen for me. It was alil touchy and frustrating but he worked me thru the specifics and got it done for me. All in all for your motorcycle helmet needs (mike) is the one to ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Tirrell Varnado

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I wanted, the charger port location wasn't a favorite but aside from that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Winston

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing but a little uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The helmet was a size too big and the bluetooth speaker rubbed against my ear and was a little irritating. The helmet was really lightweight and did look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Great for price just needs to get louder for calls and highway
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was a little louder for phone calls and Highway riding and not very air tight with the visor down for colder weather but other then that I love it
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the helmet. But the main reason I bought this helmet was for the Bluetooth and it quit working after several months. Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: brandon ricker

customer_reviews.title: Blutooth
customer_reviews.text: Love the helmet. Looks great! Fits well. Bluetooth isnt loud enough to here over road noise
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good helmet for the price. Just to much wind noise and the bluetooth is good just sometimes sounds choppy and to low
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love and adore this helmet. By far my best purchase from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Hawks

customer_reviews.title: Double visor
customer_reviews.text: So easy to connect your phone! Has a shaded visor and a normal one!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe the quality of this helmet as compared to the price and what I typically paid in the past. The bluetooth feature is spot on, only over 70mph does the sound suffer and the same for using the phone. Around 75mph it's hard to hear the caller and it's hard for the caller to hear you, but below those speeds it's great. Listening to music, same. The sun visor.....AWESOME...I love this feature, easy to use, and I just can't believe the amount of ease, features and quality in such an economical price range. A lot of helmet, peace of mind, safety, quality, and entertainment for a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: 007Top Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good helmet. My husband wrecked his bike and the helmet kept his head perfectly untouched! It did take some scratches but it protected him very well! When he wrecked it he ordered this one again because he knew it was safe.
customer_reviews.author: Momofboys

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this helmet for about 6 months and I really like it. The blue tooth works good for listening to music if turn your cell volume up. The sun visor is great but touches my nose. I would recommend this helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TORC T 15B
customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth is crap’ .. sounds great under 50mph.. Visor clearity is awesome ‘ with the flip down .
customer_reviews.author: David Howard

product_meta.title: TORC T15B Bluetooth Integrated Full Face Motorcycle Helmet With Graphic (Gloss Black Captain Shadow,Medium)
product_meta.description: Color:Gloss Black Captain Shadow| Size:MediumIntroducing the all new TORC T15, race inspired design with superior air ventilation with a rear spoiler that keeps the helmet stable during higher speeds. Also includes a build-in drop tinted visor that keeps the glare out of the way. Build-in Blinc Bluetooth.
feature_bullets: Build-in spoiler eliminates wind buffeting and improves stability at speed, Build-in Blinc Bluetooth technology
Race inspired design with superior air ventilation
Build in drop down sun visor, Certified DOT & ECE 22.05
Washable, removable Cool Max inner comfort padding

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars72 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
